Dash Interactive
  • Python Module Index

Python Module Index

s
 
s
science_modeling_tools
    science_modeling_tools.ui.dash_interactive.components.base Abstract base class for UI components
    science_modeling_tools.ui.dash_interactive.components.chat_history Chat session history sidebar component
    science_modeling_tools.ui.dash_interactive.components.chat_window Main chat message display and input component
    science_modeling_tools.ui.dash_interactive.components.log_graph Interactive graph visualization for hierarchical log structure
    science_modeling_tools.ui.dash_interactive.components.tabbed_panel Tab container for chat and log debugging views
